row.scheme: (let ((scale "100")) (set! scale (d-GetUserInput (_ "Scale Display") (_ "Give % scaling required") "100")) (if (string? scale) (begin (set! scale (/ (string->number scale) 100.0)) (format #t "Scaling by ~A~%" scale) (d-Zoom scale) (d-RefreshDisplay) )))
row._tooltip: Scales the display by value given by user.
